public ref class Rating sealed : Java::Lang::Object, Android::OS::IParcelable, IDisposable, Java::Interop::IJavaPeerable
public sealed class Rating : Java.Lang.Object, Android.OS.IParcelable, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable

.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Rating extends Java.Lang.Object implements class Android.OS.IParcelable, class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class System.IDisposable
type Rating = class inherit Object interface IParcelable interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable interface IJavaPeerable

Docs.summary: A class to encapsulate rating information used as content metadata.

remarks.para: A class to encapsulate rating information used as content metadata. A rating is defined by its rating style (see #RATING_HEART, #RATING_THUMB_UP_DOWN, #RATING_3_STARS, #RATING_4_STARS, #RATING_5_STARS or #RATING_PERCENTAGE) and the actual rating value (which may be defined as "unrated"), both of which are defined when the rating instance is constructed through one of the factory methods.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

public: property bool HasHeart { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Return whether the rating is "heart selected".
Docs.value: true if the rating is "heart selected", false if the rating is "heart unselected", if the rating style is not #RATING_HEART or if it is unrated.

remarks.para: Return whether the rating is "heart selected".
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsRated As Boolean
public: property bool IsRated { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Return whether there is a rating value available.
Docs.value: true if the instance was not created with #newUnratedRating(int).

remarks.para: Return whether there is a rating value available.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsThumbUp As Boolean
public: property bool IsThumbUp { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Return whether the rating is "thumb up".
Docs.value: true if the rating is "thumb up", false if the rating is "thumb down", if the rating style is not #RATING_THUMB_UP_DOWN or if it is unrated.

remarks.para: Return whether the rating is "thumb up".
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: true for a "heart selected" rating, false for "heart unselected".
Docs.summary: Return a Rating instance with a heart-based rating.

remarks.para: Return a Rating instance with a heart-based rating. Create and return a new Rating instance with a rating style of #RATING_HEART, and a heart-based rating.

Docs.summary: Return a Rating instance with a percentage-based rating.
Docs.returns: null if the rating is out of range, a new Rating instance otherwise.

remarks.para: Return a Rating instance with a percentage-based rating. Create and return a new Rating instance with a #RATING_PERCENTAGE rating style, and a rating of the given percentage.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Function NewStarRating (starRatingStyle As RatingStyle, starRating As Single) As Rating
public: static Android::Media::Rating ^ NewStarRating(Android::Media::RatingStyle starRatingStyle, float starRating);
public static Android.Media.Rating? NewStarRating (Android.Media.RatingStyle starRatingStyle, float starRating);
.method public static hidebysig class Android.Media.Rating NewStarRating(valuetype Android.Media.RatingStyle starRatingStyle, float32 starRating) cil managed
static member NewStarRating : Android.Media.RatingStyle * single -> Android.Media.Rating

Docs.param: a number ranging from 0.0f to 3.0f, 4.0f or 5.0f according to the rating style.
Docs.summary: Return a Rating instance with a star-based rating.
Docs.returns: null if the rating style is invalid, or the rating is out of range, a new Rating instance otherwise.

remarks.para: Return a Rating instance with a star-based rating. Create and return a new Rating instance with one of the star-base rating styles and the given integer or fractional number of stars. Non integer values can for instance be used to represent an average rating value, which might not be an integer number of stars.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Return a Rating instance with a thumb-based rating.

remarks.para: Return a Rating instance with a thumb-based rating. Create and return a new Rating instance with a #RATING_THUMB_UP_DOWN rating style, and a "thumb up" or "thumb down" rating.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Return a Rating instance with no rating.
Docs.returns: null if an invalid rating style is passed, a new Rating instance otherwise.
